amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 118-7 to strike section 2(e).
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to strike subsection (e) within the Prohibition on Federal employee censorship which states while using any information system or information technology (as defined under section 11101 of title 40).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 209 - 221 (Roll no. 139).

action.text: Amendment (A006) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
